entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
